CHAPTER.VERS: Khrih Jesuh tawh i kipawlna hangin hong kipia ding nuntakna thu a gen dingin Pasian’ deihna tawh Khrih Jesuh’ sawltak nasep a sem dingin a hong kisawl keimah Paul in
Ka it ka ta Timoti tungah lai ka hong khak hi.Pa Pasian le i Topa Khrih Jesuh in dikna, hehpihna le nopsakna thupha nang tungah hong tungsak tahen.
A sun a zanin ka thungetna-ah nang ka hong phawk tawntung a, ka pu ka pate’ sep mah bangin kisuanna lungsim om hetloin a na ka sep Pasian tungah ka lungdamna ka ko hi.
Na khitui luannate phawk ka hih manin ka lung a dam theih nadingin nang tawh kimu nuamin a sun a zanin ka ngaihsun tawntung hi.
Na pi Lois le na nu Eunis in a neih upna bangte pawl mah, lungsim takpi tawh na upna thu ka phawk a, tu-in zong nang sungah tua bang upna om hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
Tua ahih manin nang tungah ka khut nga-in thu ka hong ngetsak lai-in nangma tungah Pasian in hong piak siamna na sosuah nadingin ka hong phawksak hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in eite tungah meidawina lungsim hong guan lo a, thahatna, ki-itna, pumpi ki-uk zawhna lungsim hong guan hizaw hi.

Tua ahih manin i Topa’ thu gen nading thu-ah ahi a, ama thu hangin thong a kia keima thu-ah ahi zongin maizum het kei in. Pasian in nangma tungah thahatna hong pia ahih mah bangin Lungdamna Thu hangin thuakna-ah zong a thuak nuam hizaw in.

Eite’ sep zawhna hang hi loin ama ngimnasa bang leh a dikna hangin Pasian in eite hong hon khia-in ama mi dingin a hong sam hi. Pasian in leitung a pianma pekin Khrih Jesuh tungtawnin tua dikna a hong piak hi a,
tuhun ciangin eite hong Honpa Khrih Jesuh tungtawnin a dikna hong langsak ta hi. Tua Jesuh in sihna beisak a, lungdamna thu hangin sih nawn lohna thu a hong kilangsak hi.
Hih a thak Lungdamna Thu hilhin a taangko ding le sawltak na a sem dingin kei a hong kikoih ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin hih bang teng a thuak ka hi hi. Ahi zongin ka up pa ka thei a, ama tungah ka apte tua Ni dong hong kepsak zo ding hi, ci-in thei ka hih manin ka maizum het kei hi.
Keima tung panin na zaksa a man thute zui inla, Khrih Jesuh tawh i kipawlna hangin i ngah upna le itna thu-ah kiptakin om in.
Eite sungah a hong teeng Kha Siangtho in a hong ap thuhoihte limtakin kem in.
Na theihsa bangin Asia gam sunga om mi khempeuh in kei hong nusia uh a, tuate lakah Figelas le Hermogenes-te zong kihel uh hi.
Onesiforas in tamveipi kei hong lungnuamsak ahih manin Pasian in a innkuan bupun hehpihna thupha pia tahen. Ka thongkiatna hangin amah maizum lo a,
Rom khua hong tun ciangin kei hong muh matengin hong zong pah hi.
Topa in tua Ni ciangin ama tungah hehpihna thupha pia tahen. Efesa khua-ah ka om lai-in nakpitakin kei a hong huhnate khempeuh na theihsa ahi hi.
Ka ta aw, nang na hih leh Khrih Jesuh tawh i kipawl manin i ngah hehpihna hangin thahatin om in.
Mi tampite’ theihin ka thuhilh, na zaksa thu khempeuh, midangte a hilhsawn thei dingin a citak mite tungah hoihtakin a zuih dingun na hilh in.
Khrih Jesuh’ galkap hoih hihna tawh thuak dingin a kisam khempeuh na na thuak in.
Galkap a semlai mipa in ama tungah a om bupa a lungkimsak theih nadingin na sem ahih manin tualsung mite’ nasep tawh thuahkhawm lo hi.
Kimawl kidemna-ah a kihel mi khatpeuh in kimawlna ngeina zui lopi-in gualzawh pahtawina ngah thei lo hi.
Hahkat takin lo a khopa in anlak hun ciangin a tam pen a ngah dingin a kilawm ahi hi.
Topa in thu khempeuh na theih nadingin hong huh ding ahih manin hih ka thugente khempeuh limtakin na ngaihsun in.
Lungdamna Thu ka hilhna sungah ka gen mah bangin David’ suan, sihna panin a kithosak Jesuh Khrih na na phawk in.
Ama hangin a kingah Lungdamna Thu ka hilh manin gimna ka thuak a, mithat bangin sikkol hong kibulh hi. Pasian’ thu ahihleh sikkol kibulh thei lo hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian’ teel mite in zong Khrih Jesuh hangin hotkhiatna le tawntung minthanna a ngahkhawm theih nadingun amaute’ hangin na khempeuh ka thuak hi.
Tua ahih manin,“Amah tawh i sihkhawm leamah tawh i nungta khawm ding hi.
Eite in gimna i thuak paisuak zawh lehamah tawh i ukkhawm ding hi.Amah i nial lehamah in zong eite hong nial ding hi.
Amah le amahkikhem thei lo ahih manineite i citak kei zonginamah citak veve ding hi,”ci-in a kigenna thu man mahmah hi.
Na mite thu kinialin a kitot loh nadingun Pasian’ mai-ah thupi takin na hilh khol in. Tua bang thu kinialna in a za mite phattuamna ngahsak loin a siasak bek ahi hi.
Pasian’ thuman a mantakin hilhin, na nasepna-ah maizumna thuak loin, Pasian’ pahtakna na ngah theih nadingin na siam tawpin hanciam in.
Pasian tawh mite a kigamlasak semsem thei thu ginalo, a haihuai thu kikup thu kiseelnate na pelh in.
Tua bangin amau’ thugennate in mite siasak a, tua banga thugente lakah Hymenaias le Filetas a kihel uh hi.
Thuman lampi panin amaute pialkhin uh a, thawhkikna thu pen a beisa thu hi ta hi, ci-in thu um mi pawlkhat lungmangsak uh hi.

Ahi zongin Pasian in a phuhsa sutpi kilok zo ngei lo ding hi. Tua sutpi tungah, “Topa in ama mi kua teng hiam cih thei hi,” cihna le, “Topa tawh kipawl ing, a ci peuhmah in mawhna sukha lo ding hi,” cihna kigelh hi.

Inn lian khat peuhpeuh sungah umlebeel a nam tuamtuam a om hi. Pawlkhatte ngun tawh kibawl a, pawlkhatte kham tawh kibawl a, pawlkhatte sing tawh, pawlkhatte tungman tawh kibawl hi. Pawlkhatte a thupi diakin zattheih ding, pawlkhatte nisimin a mawkmawkin zattheih ding ahi hi.

Mi khatpeuh a hoih lo na khempeuh panin kikemin a siangtho takin a om nakleh na hoih nam khempeuh a sem dingin a Topa tungah ki-apin, a Topa tungah a manpha suak ahih manin a thupi diakte-ah amah kizang ding hi.
Tua ahih manin khangno lunggulhna hoih lote pelh inla, lungsim takpi tawh Topa tungah huhna a ngen mite tawh thuman thutak, upna, itna, kilemna na neih theih nadingun hanciam khawm un.
Thu kihai seelna, thei lo pi-a thu kinialnate na pelh in. Tua bangte in kitotna a piansak lamtak na theihsa ahi hi.
Topa’ na a sem mite, kitot a hatte hi lo dinga, mi khempeuh tungah lungsim nemin, thugen siamin, thuak zawhna nei-in,
thunem tawh a langte’ hoih lohna a puahtheite hi ding hi. Tua bang hileh Pasian in amaute kisiksak thei dinga, thuman thutak hong thei-in,
Dawimangpa in ama deihna bangin a gamta dingin a mat khit hangin ama thang panin amaute suakta khathei ding uh hi.
Nitawp ni hun pen a lauhuai hun ahih ding lamtak phawk in.
Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu le pate’ thu mang loin, lungdam theihna mel nei loin, biakna lungsim nei loin,
mi khual loin, hehpihna nei loin, mi gensia-in, ngongtatin, kihtakhuai-in, thuhoih deih loin,
ciampelin, thu khual loin, kiphasak gawpin, Pasian don loin pumpi nopsakna bek deihin,
biakna thu a puatham teng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deih lo ding uh hi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in.
Tua bang mite pawlkhat, mite inn-ah va hawh khiankhianin, deihna nam tuamtuam le mawhna lungsim tawh a kidim numeite na thuzawh uh hi.
Tua bang numeite in thu a zakzak uh hangin a man le a man lo khen thei lo uh ahih manin thuman thutak thei zo lo uh hi.
Jannes le Jambres-te in Moses thu a nial mah bangin upna paizia a man lo hih thuhilh mite in zong thuman thutak a nial uh hi.
Ahi zongin Jannes le Jambres-te tungah a piangsa thu mah bangin mi khempeuh in amaute’ haina mu ding uh ahih manin a nasepna uh sau tung khol lo ding hi.
Ahi zongin nangmah in ahihleh ka thuhilhna, ka gamtatna le ka nuntakna-ah ka ngim ka tup thute na hong zui hi. Ka upna, ka lungduaina, itna ka neihna, ka lungkipna,

bawlsiatna ka thuakna, gimna ka thuakna le Antiok, Ikonium le Lystra khuate-ah kei tunga thupiang, nasia takin bawlsiatna ka thuaknate na theih na phawksa ahi hi. Ahi zongin Topa in hih haksatnate khempeuh panin kei hong suaktasak hi.
Khrih Jesuh tawh kipawlin Pasian’ deihna bangin a nungta nuam khempeuh in bawlsiatna a thuak ding mah hi a,
migilote le thu thei kineihin mi khem theite zong siattat semsemin, amaute in mi khemkhemin, amaute mah in zong khemna a thuak ding mah uh ahi hi.
Ahi zongin nang na hih leh na theihsa na upsa thute ah kip paisuak in. Nang tungah thu hong hilhte kua mi ahi hiam cih na theihsa hi a,
Khrih Jesuh upna hangin hotkhiatna a hong ngahsak thei ding pilna a hong pia Lai Siangtho pen na neutung a kipanin a theisa na hihna thu zong na theihsa thu mah ahi hi.

Pasian’ na a sem mite mi cingtaak hi-in, na hoih namkim a sep theih nadingun Lai Siangtho pen Pasian’ lamlahna tawh a hong kipia hi a, thuman thutak hilh nading, a khialte taii nading, a man lote a manin puah nading, a manin nuntak theih nading thuhilh nadingin a manpha mahmah ahi hi.
Pasian’ mai le a hingte hitaleh a site hitaleh mi khempeuh’ thu a khen ding Khrih Jesuh’ mai-ah nakpitakin ka hong hanthawn hi. Amah Kumpi-in hong paikikin ukna hong kipan ding ahih manin,
hunhoih hunsia cih khen tuan loin Pasian’ thu hilh ding na kin ngaihsut nading, lungduaina tawh mite’ lungsim zo-in, mite taii-in, hanthawnin na hilh nadingin thu a hong pia ka hi hi.
Mite in thuman a ngaih nop loh hun, amaute’ deihna bek a zuihnop hun, amaute’ zaknop thute bek a gen ding sia a cial thuahthuah hun hong tung ding hi.
Amaute in thuman thutak ngai nuam nawn loin tangthu phuahtawm peuh ngaihsutpi-in nei ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin nang na hih leh thu khempeuh ah na lungsim ki-ukin haksatnate na thuak inla, Pasian’ thugen nasep semin, na nasepna-ah maa na tun in.
Kei ka hih leh Pasian biakna-in hong kipiak ding hun hong tungta hi. Hih leitung nuntakna ka nusiat ding hun hita hi.
Kidemna-ah ka hat tawpin ka hih khin a, a mong dongin ka tai khin a, upna thu khotakin lenin ka zokhin hi.

Thu a manin a khen Topa in tua Ni ciangin kei a hong piak ding thuman lukhu ahi gualzawhna thaman in tu-in kei hong ngak gige hi. Kei tung bekah a hong pia ding hi lo a, ama hong paikik ding itna tawh a ngakte khempeuh tungah zong a pia ding ahi hi.
Kei kiangah na hong pai baih theih nadingin hong hanciam in.
Demas in hih leitung thu kin zaw ahih manin kei hong nusia-in Thesalonika khua-ah a pai hi. Kresen, Galatia gamah pai a, Titus, Dalmatia gamah pai hi.
Luka bek kei kiangah om hi. Marka in nasepna-ah nakpitakin hong huh thei ahih manin na hong pai ciangin amah hong tonpih in.
Tikhikas ahihleh Efesa khua-ah ka paisak khin hi.
Na hong pai ciangin Troas khua-ah Karpas kiang a ka nusiat ka puantualpi hong pua inla, laibute zong, a diakdiakin savun laidalte tawh zong hong pua in.
Sikseekpa Alexander in kei tungah siatna lianpi hong bawl hi. Ama gamtatna tawh kizui-in Topa in thuk ding hi.
Amah in i thuhilhna nakpitakin nial ahih manin amah tawh kisai-ah nangma pumpi kidawm mahmah in.
Keimah kihut nading thu ka gen masak ni-in kuamah in hong koppih loin hong taisan mang uh hi. Tua thu hangin mawhsakna thuak kei beek uh hen!
Ahi zongin Topa in kei hong ompih a, Gentail mi khempeuh tungah Pasian’ thu a kicingin ka gen theih nadingin thahatna a hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin sih nading thukhenna pan hong suaktasak hi.
Topa in siatna khempeuh panin kei hong hon khia dinga, ama vantung gamah muanhuai takin hong tunpih ding hi. Amah in a tawntungin minthanna ngah tahen. Amen.
Prisilla, Aquila le Onesiforas-te innkuan na hopihsak in.
Erastas, Korin khua-ah omlai hi. Trofimas, Miletas khua-ah a cina-in ka nusia hi.
Phalbi tunma-in nong pai theih nadingin hong hanciam in. Eubulas, Pudens, Linas, Klaudias le i sanggam dangte khempeuh in zong hong hopih uh hi.
Topa in nangmah hong ompih tahen. Note khempeuh tungah Pasian’ hehpihna thupha hong tung tahen.
